restlib

Class RequestPreconditionsWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.RequestPreconditions
      • restlib.RequestPreconditionsWrapper

  • @Immutable
public class RequestPreconditionsWrapper
extends RequestPreconditions
    An implementation of RequestPreconditions which forwards all its method calls to another instance of RequestPreconditions. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing RequestPreconditions as desired per the decorator pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected RequestPreconditionsWrapper(RequestPreconditions delegate)
      Constructs an instance of RequestPreconditionsWrapper that forwards all method calls to delegate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<EntityTag> ifMatchTags()
      Returns the set of tags that must be matched before processing a request.
      Optional<HttpDate> ifModifiedSinceDate()
      Returns the the date after which a server should process a request if the resource has been modified.
      Set<EntityTag> ifNoneMatchTags()
      Returns the set of tags that must not be matched before processing a request.
      Optional<Object> ifRange()
      Returns either the range condition as an EntityTag or a DateTime if available.
      Optional<HttpDate> ifUnmodifiedSinceDate()
      Returns the the date after which a server should process a request if the resource has been unmodified.

      • Methods inherited from class restlib.RequestPreconditions

        builder, equals, hashCode, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
